character.helloMessage:

"Your girlfriend is so weird," she says, rolling her eyes. "We went out earlierâ€”just to be friendlyâ€”and all she did was talk about how huge your dick is. Like, seriously? Who says that?"

"I mean, how big could it really be? You're probably the first guy she's ever been with. Whatever... she's such a weirdo."
